content: wavy dishcloth © 2008 andrea moberly materials us size f hook two colors of worsted weight cotton special techniques crab stitch foundation chain using color a make a chain that is a multiple of 8 + 3 chain for starting chain row 1 starting in 3rd chain from hook make 1 double_crochet *1 half_double_crochet in next chain 1 single_crochet in each of next 3 chain 1 half_double_crochet in next chain 1 double_crochet in each of next 3 cs repeat from * to end ending with only 2 double_crochet 1 double_crochet in each of last two chain instead of 1 double_crochet in each of next 3 chain chain 1 turn row 2 single_crochet in each st across row 3 join color b chain 1 1 single_crochet in same stitch 1 single_crochet in next single_crochet *1 half_double_crochet in next single_crochet 1 double_crochet in each of next 3 single_crochet 1 half_double_crochet in next single_crochet 1 single_crochet in each of next 3 single_crochet repeat from * to end ending with only 2 single_crochet 1 single_crochet in each of last two single_crochet instead of 1 single_crochet in each of next 3 single_crochet chain 1 turn row 4 single_crochet in each st across row 5 drawing color a up along edge switch to this color chain 3 1 double_crochet in next single_crochet *1 half_double_crochet in next single_crochet 1 single_crochet in each of next 3 single_crochet 1 half_double_crochet in next single_crochet 1 double_crochet in each of next 3 single_crochet repeat from * to end ending with only 2 double_crochet 1 double_crochet in each of last two single_crochet instead of 1 double_crochet in each of next 3 single_crochet chain 1 turn row 6 single_crochet in each st across repeat row 3-6 till dishcloth is approximately square drawing colors along the edge without pulling tight these will be hidden in the edging using last worked color crab stitch all the way around working one crab st in each st along the wavy ends 2 crab stitches in each corner and 2 crab stitches in each double_crochet along the side only one for the single_crochet row **feel free to use this pattern for personal use or profit please just credit me with my name and web address if you post the pattern
